schema.errorToClientPolicy: Defines the level of verbosity of the server errors that occur during requests reported to the client; one of "bare" | "normal"  "verbose"
schema.hostname: The IP address for the http server to listen on, e.g. "0.0.0.0"
schema.port: The port for the http server to listen on, e.g. 3000

schema.host: The host or ip address of the database server; e.g. "localhost"
schema.port: The port of the database server to connect on; e.g. 27017
schema.name: The name of the default database for the application; e.g. "samantha"
schema.limit: Default limit for all database queries; e.g. 500

schema.output: The directory to direct the build ouptut to, e.g. '../out/production'
schema.tests: Indicates whether unit tests and performance tests sould be included in the build output, e.g. true

collect.sourceDirectory: The source directory to collect files and directories from, e.g. '../../../../../../framework/Falael.PrimordialBlocks/js/pb'; "_moduleAliases" keys from package.json are accepted
collect.targetDirectory: The target directory to copy collected files and directories to (all contents of this directory will be deleted aforehand), e.g. '../../pb'; "_moduleAliases" keys from package.json are accepted
collect.recursive: Indicates whether to follow or to ignore subdirectories, e.g. true

debug-manifest.directory: A source directory to enumerate files from for the purposes of generating a debu manifest, e.g. '../../../../../../framework/Falael.PrimordialBlocks/js/pb'; "_moduleAliases" keys from package.json are accepted
debug-manifest.recursive: Indicates whether to follow or to ignore subdirectories, e.g. true
